HTMLTitleElement.summary: The HTMLTitleElement interface is implemented by a document's {{ HTMLElement( "title" )}}. This element inherits all of the properties and methods of the interface.

remarks.para: -The HTML element implementing this interface: title.

HTMLTitleElementText.summary: The text property of the interface represents the child text content of the document's title as a string. It contains the {{HTMLelement("title")}} element's content as text; if HTML tags are included within the <title> element, they are included as part of the string value rather than being parsed as HTML.

remarks.para: Setting a value for the text property replaces the entire text contents of the <title>.
